scripts.?info: Display usage information about the npm run scripts.
scripts.?dev:
Start the app in development mode with live reload.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/serve
scripts.?preview:
Start the app in development mode with live reload and preview mode.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/serve
scripts.?serve:
Run the app in the browser for development.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/serve
scripts.?build:
Build the web assets for production. Deploys to `/dist`.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/build
scripts.?test:unit:
Run web layer unit tests using Jest.
For more options: https://cli.vuejs.org/core-plugins/unit-jest.html#injected-commands
scripts.?test:e2e:
Run web layer e2e tests using Cypress.
For more options: https://cli.vuejs.org/core-plugins/e2e-cypress.html#injected-commands
scripts.?lint:
Lint the web layer code.
For more options: https://cli.vuejs.org/core-plugins/eslint.html
scripts.?cap:build:
Build and deploys the web application to the native platform projects.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-build
scripts.cap:build:android: set NODE_ENV=development && export NODE_ENV=development && ionic cap copy android
scripts.?cap:build:android:
Build and deploys the web application to the native Android platform project.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-build
scripts.cap:build:ios: set NODE_ENV=development && export NODE_ENV=development && ionic cap copy ios
scripts.?cap:build:ios:
Build and deploys the web application to the native iOS platform project.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-build
scripts.?cap:update:
Update native platforms and dependencies with any pending plugin changes.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-update
scripts.?cap:update:android:
Update native Android platform and dependencies with any pending plugin changes.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-update
scripts.?cap:update:ios:
Update native iOS platform and dependencies with any pending plugin changes.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-update
scripts.?list-devices:android: List available Android devices/emulators for use as run targets.
scripts.?list-devices:ios: List available iOS devices/simulators for use as run targets.
scripts.?open:android: Open the native Android project in Android Studio
scripts.?open:ios: Open the native iOS project in Xcode
scripts.run:android: npm run cap:build && ionic cap run android
scripts.?run:android:
Run the app on an Android device/emulator. Specify --target to choose a specific run target.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-run
scripts.run:ios: npm run cap:build && ionic cap run ios
scripts.?run:ios:
Run the app on an iOS device/simulator. Specify --target to choose a specific run target.
For more options: https://ionicframework.com/docs/cli/commands/capacitor-run
scripts.run:android:livereload: npm run cap:build && ionic cap run android -l --external
scripts.?run:android:livereload: Run the app on an Android device/emulator with live reload functionality.
scripts.run:ios:livereload: npm run cap:build && ionic cap run ios -l --external
scripts.?run:ios:livereload: Run the app on an iOS device/simulator with live reload functionality.
